channel.title: H's Empire - [PI] - Need Professional Coders
channel.description:
[center][center][center][IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/xogqcg.png[/img][/center]
[center]Hi Moparscapers, All I am looking for, here, are Developers that can do anything in Java.[/center]
[center][b]I am using the source HyBriD PvP V4, Please note that I did not leech this, I have paid for this.[/b][/center]
[center][b]Also, Please note that the server is offline as I need Developers to help me add stuff.[/b][/center]
[center]Now, I use a 1GB VPS, and so far we have had no lag. When we get more people, I will buy a 8GB VPS.
Picture of my VPS:
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/x58i69.png[/img] [/center]
Now Pictures of the Server & other stuff:
Hiscores with even Summoning and Hunter!
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/wwf1v4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/zvotnn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2zibgqg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/amu00m.png[/img]
Now In-game:
Nice Fullscreen: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/kbvr0j.png[/img]
New Emotes: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2mz9thv.png[/img]
Level Tab: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/f2lzlv.png[/img]
Combat Tab: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/keaqzc.png[/img]
Lottery: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/34sgpz6.png[/img]
Teleports: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2u97bro.png[/img]
And the Webclient: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2pzgv8p.png[/img][/center]
[b]Now the Application Format: [code=Application Format]How Old Are You: How Many Years Experience In Java: E-mail address: Time zone you are currently in: Examples of code(S) you have written: Contact Information (Skype, MSN, Whatever..) :[/code] [/center]

item.title: H's Empire - [PI] - Need Professional Coders
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

AtomicInt_:

Project insanity is not stable. Period.

When did you get the idea I said it was stable…
If you had eyes and looked a few pages back I stated hybrid pvp vp is not stable
Therefore it won’t hold much on a 1gb vps…

Read full topic

item.title: H's Empire - [PI] - Need Professional Coders
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:40, topic:427364”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=530060.msg3870825#msg3870825 date=1325323024]

No… You’re just retarded. He didn’t even say a word about Hyperion, he said Shard.

@coleho the reason it did is because it’s Hyperion by graham

BECAUSE YOU SAID YOU HOSTED A HYPERION ON THAT MUCH RAM.
[/quote]
But my name is not coleho…[/quote]

I’m very sorry lol, I’m going to get off now. It’s obviously been a long day for me, It’s 4 AM here. Again, I apologize for getting the wrong person.

Read full topic

item.title: H's Empire - [PI] - Need Professional Coders
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:30, topic:427364”][quote author=chillwitm888 link=topic=530060.msg3870789#msg3870789 date=1325320931]

1gb would be more than enough for running a private server.

that shit would get eaten up like cake

Considering how poorly programmed PI is, all the problems it has, yup.

@Coelho, the reason it did is because it was Hyperion by Graham.

How do you know that
It could be different source with great stability
Like shards
[/quote]

The title says “PI”, he’d need to re-write everything to make it like Shard.[/quote]
How you worded this almost implied that it was based of hyperion

Read full topic

item.title: H's Empire - [PI] - Need Professional Coders
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“lemme_winks_, post:28, topic:427364”][quote author=chillwitm888 link=topic=530060.msg3870782#msg3870782 date=1325320590]

1gb would be more than enough for running a private server.

that shit would get eaten up like cake

I had a pc with 128mb ram i ran a source and it held 30 players lag free
I believe it was graham’s Hyperion or some other source
[/quote]
almost certain the PC you used had no implementations of a graphical interface, or any other additional process used by a windows or mac computer. did you use a scratch command-line operated OS like arch?[/quote]

EDIT: I have no idea where you’re getting that from. I never even implied that PI is based on Hyperion, that’s batshit insane.

Read full topic
